description:
TRAINING PROFILE
SUBJECT: #178
STIPULATIONS
Require direct assessment to counter, confirm or expand assumptions prior to analysis / intervention.
REF. SESSION: #5362
STATS
Age: 22
Sign: Leo
Measurements: 33-24-34 D
Height / weight: 5'7'', 115
Breasts: real
Anal: No
Status: Owned by Mr. Torn
HISTORY
Five years in the lifestyle
Started shy and meek, counter w/ emergence into adult state of assertiveness / confidence.
PROCLIVITIES
Hoods, encasement, ballet boots
Piss, corporal punishment
Tits hurt, slapped, breath play
Face slapping, choking, hair pulling
EXCEPTIONS
When asked about Dislikes? 'None, really.'

ASSETS

DEFICIENCIES

PAIN MANAGEMENT SKILLS

LIMITS

PHOBIAS

SEXUALITY
'Difficulty orgasming, particularly in any position other than laying on my back, or any position I find physically stressful.'
ISSUES

Inner struggle between emerging assertive behavior and submission

OBSERVATIONS
Articulate, intelligent writer, speaker

Enjoys service when able to perform
Naturally acquiescent personality
QUOTES
Q: What do you enjoy about being dominated?
A: 'I enjoy feeling helpless and just the fact that it's kinda fucked up.' (laughter)
Q: Relationship with pain?
A: 'I would not call myself a pain-slut. I like it, but I take it because I want to please, not because I get off on the pain'.
title: The Training of Cherry Torn, Day One
